msg: Fix predefined variable names: should not be prefixed with "sling." but just be plain names

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-72 Fix three issues with the ScriptResolver: nt:file node handling if jcr:content is nt:unstructured; wrong test for node item; wrong behaviour for requests with selectors.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-69 Fix EspReader.read(char[], int, int) method which does not handle offset and length and read counting correctly. Add unit tests.
